scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:app
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:app
scripts.build:app: npm run clear:ts && webpack --config webpack.config.cjs --env production
scripts.build:types: ../../../lib/start.js generate Gtk-3.0 Pango-1.0 WebKit2-4.0 --environments gjs --moduleType esm --useNamespace --fixConflicts
scripts.clear: npm run clear:ts && npm run clear:types
scripts.validate: npm run validate:types && npm run validate:app
